RuyiSDK Eclipse Plugins Update Site

%PUBLISH_DATE%

中文

Environment Requirements

  1. Eclipse IDE: 2024-12 (4.34) or newer
  2. Operating System: Linux
  3. Processor Architecture: riscv64, aarch64 and x86_64

Add this Site

  1. Launch the IDE, open the "Help" menu at the top menu bar, and click "Install New Software..."
  2. In the opened window, click the "Add..." button to open the "Add Repository" dialog
  3. Fill in the following information and click the "Add" button
    Name: RuyiSDK Updates (GitHub)
    Location: https://ruyisdk.github.io/ruyisdk-eclipse-plugins/
  4. Go back to the "Install" window, and choose the newly added site from the "Work with" dropdown box
  5. After the information is loaded, expand "RuyiSDK IDE" and check "RuyiSDK IDE Feature", then click the "Next >" button to start the installation

Check for Updates

  1. Launch the IDE, open the "Help" menu from the top menu bar, and click "Check for Updates"
  2. After the "Available Updates" window opens, if "RuyiSDK IDE Feature" appears in the table, it means a new version of this plugin has been released. Click the "Next >" button to start the update

Need Help?

  • Please create posts in "RISC-V Developer Community": https://ruyisdk.cn/
  • You can also ask questions in the GitHub repository of this repository: https://github.com/ruyisdk/ruyisdk-eclipse-plugins/issues
